mapper.select: SELECT wms_trader.*, CONCAT( REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(wms_trader.trader_PCD,'["',''),'","',''),'"]',''), wms_trader.trader_address ) AS deliveredAddress FROM wms_trader WHERE 1=1 and wms_trader.id=#{traderId}

SELECT wms_trader.*, CONCAT( REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(wms_trader.trader_PCD,'["',''),'","',''),'"]',''), wms_trader.trader_address ) AS deliveredAddress FROM wms_trader WHERE 1=1
AND wms_trader.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
